about.abouttext2: In northern Colorado Springs there is an established neighborhood called Pulpit Rock, also known as Erindale. It is located South of Woodmen Road, West of Academy Blvd. and East of I-25. The natural beauty of the area with the huge rock formations, towering Ponderosa Pines. Austin Bluffs Open Space is central to this area with over 500 acres of open spac. There are gorgeous trails for hiking, mountain biking and horseback riding.
